Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Enter the token with the `Bearer: ` prefix, e.g. "Bearer \<\<Your API KEY\>\>".

Basic.description: Provide the Base64 representation of your `client_id:secret` e.g. "Basic \<\<BASE64\>\>".

metaDescription: Automate your business workflows and lower your costs with MeasureOne, the most comprehensive and accurate platform for income, employment, education, insurance verification, and more. Benefit from unmatched scale with 10,000+ data sources, breakthrough processing speeds, and best-in-class consumer-permissioned data and document upload workflows for optimal conversion. MeasureOne is committed to protecting customer data and maintains the highest security standards, including SOC2 compliance. With a variety of integration options from no-code to a universal API, your data needs are covered. For more information, visit measureone.com.
apiDescription: Automate your business workflows and lower your costs with MeasureOne, the most comprehensive and accurate platform for income, employment, education, insurance verification, and more. Benefit from unmatched scale with 10,000+ data sources, breakthrough processing speeds, and best-in-class consumer-permissioned data and document upload workflows for optimal conversion. MeasureOne is committed to protecting customer data and maintains the highest security standards, including SOC2 compliance. With a variety of integration options from no-code to a universal API, your data needs are covered. For more information, visit measureone.com.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version number of the MeasureOne API you wish to integrate.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: Content-type of the request payload. MeasureOne accepts content in application/json format unless specified otherwise

parameters.example: Please use this invitation for University of Michigan Ann Arbor

repositoryDescription: Automate business workflows with MeasureOne, offering comprehensive income, employment, education, and insurance verification services. Benefit from 10,000+ data sources, fast processing speeds, secure data protection, and flexible integration options. MeasureOne's {language} SDK generated by Konfig (https://konfigthis.com/).
